item.description: Hellooooo Fellow Wedelns & Friends!!! Please join me for a tour of beautiful Rockport Harbor Massachusetts and paddle to Thacher Island on Saturday June 27th at 1pm This is a 3 1/2 hrs / 4 mile paddle and NO Experience is Necessary Located a half-mile off the eastern shore of Cape Ann, Thacher Island has something for everyone. After circling the island to view its high granite cliffs and towering lighthouses, kayakers can land on the west-shore ramp and enjoy a tour. The 50-acre island contains a National Wildlife Refuge, and birders will love wandering the extensive trails and observing the variety of species that nest on or visit the island. Thacher hosts two lighthouses, the only operating twin lighthouses remaining in America. The North Tower is on the National Register of Historic Places and is open to the public. Visitors who climb the 155 stairs to the catwalk, 166 feet above the sea, are treated to a fantastic view of the Atlantic coast from Boston to Maine When Saturday, June 27, 2009 1:00 PM Where North Shore Kayak Outdoor Center 9 Tuna Wharf Rockport, MA 01966 978-546-5050 http://www.northshorekayak.com/ RSVP Deadline You have until Thursday - June 25, 2009 6:00 PM to RSVP. Costs: (Please NOTE this is special Pricing for friends of the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club) $45 per person and it includes; 20 minutes of instruction, guides, touring kayak, PFD (personal floatation device) paddle, spray skirt, and tones of FUN!!! Cancellation policy: if we cancel the tour due to weather conditions, there is no charge to you, but if you cancel less than 24 hours in advance, we will charge your credit card $10 per person. PLEASE Call for your reservations and hold your spot with a credit card. The number is (978) 546-5050 and you MUST mention that you are part of the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club Thatcher Island Tour hosted by Michele DeSoto. If you plan to bring your own kayak then there is a $30 fee to join this tour and you can use the Rockport public boat ramp to launch your kayak. (Bradley Wharf:  http://www.mass.gov/czm/coastguide/online/descriptions/rockport_harbor.htm)  Please feel free to call or email me if you have any questions. =) Michele c: 978-836-7165
item.how_to_find_us: meet me at the Outdoor Center
item.name: Kayak to Thatcher Island
